Name: DanielTheRocketMan
AboutMe:
I am a chemical engineer.

I have got a PHD in Electronic Engineering and Computer Science. I am a Professor of a Department of Economics where I teach Financial Economics and Econometrics.

I am well versed in scientific programming, numerical methods, econometrics, machine learning and artificial intelligence. I also have some knowledge of algorithm theory. Now, I am trying to improve my knowledge about OOP and design patterns.

I used to program in Pascal and Fortran. I also programmed in OX and SAS.

I have some experience in C++, JAVA and Matlab. I really enjoy programming in JAVA.

I am a beginner in PHP+MySQL, R and Python. I am getting used to programming in PHP.

I really love this site!
